job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Junior to Mid (1-4yrs commercial experience) ETL/Data Engineer/Analytics role</strong> </p><p><em>nChoose2 acting as agency for social and environmental start-up, equal opportunity employer</em> </p><ul><li>Onboard/extract new feeds into PostgreSQL database, Fivetran sync/load them to Snowflake on AWS, transform data with DBT (SQL-based) for reporting layer (Tableau internal user or Ruby/React Web App external user) </li><li>US working rights (no sponsorship) required + ability to work Pacific/Mountain time (GMT-6/7), though 99% remote working autonomously and updating team over slack/Zoom </li><li>Open communicator to stakeholders of hands-on Head of Data in Denver + CFO in San Fran + Senior Engineer in Perth Australia </li><li>USD 65-85k base + generous package ( e.g. 20d paid-time-off + ~6.5k Equity Options + 2k personal development budget + 401k and matching contribs) </li><li>B E Eng/CS preferred</li></ul>
